title: Symbolism in Movies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/10/20
itunes:title: Symbolism in Movies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/10/20
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and author Robert Sullivan discuss his research into symbolism and the true meaning behind hidden messages found in movies such as Midsommar, Joker, The Shining, Fight Club, The Matrix and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
